verses.name: Psalms 28:1
verses.text: Psalmus David, in consummatione tabernaculi.   Afferte Domino, filii Dei,  afferte Domino filios arietum.

verses.name: Psalms 28:2
verses.text: Afferte Domino gloriam et honorem ;  afferte Domino gloriam nomini ejus ;  adorate Dominum in atrio sancto ejus.

verses.name: Psalms 28:3
verses.text: Vox Domini super aquas ;  Deus majestatis intonuit :  Dominus super aquas multas.

verses.name: Psalms 28:4
verses.text: Vox Domini in virtute ;  vox Domini in magnificentia.

verses.name: Psalms 28:5
verses.text: Vox Domini confringentis cedros,  et confringet Dominus cedros Libani :

verses.name: Psalms 28:6
verses.text: et comminuet eas, tamquam vitulum Libani,  et dilectus quemadmodum filius unicornium.

verses.name: Psalms 28:8
verses.text: vox Domini concutientis desertum :  et commovebit Dominus desertum Cades.

verses.name: Psalms 28:9
verses.text: Vox Domini præparantis cervos :  et revelabit condensa,  et in templo ejus omnes dicent gloriam.

verses.name: Psalms 28:10
verses.text: Dominus diluvium inhabitare facit,  et sedebit Dominus rex in æternum.

verses.name: Psalms 28:11
verses.text: Dominus virtutem populo suo dabit ;  Dominus benedicet populo suo in pace.
